text: Christin Carmichael Greb () is a Canadian politician, who was elected to Toronto City Council in the 2014 city council election to succeed Karen Stintz in Ward 16. She is the daughter of former Don Valley West Member of Parliament John Carmichael. She successfully advocated for residents in her ward after they complained about bylaw notices for hockey and basketball nets blocking roads.
